CustomField.description: Opportunity feature assignment status pulled from the status of related feature request record.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Feature__r.Status__c , "Investigating") , "Investigating", IF( ISPICKVAL( Feature__r.Status__c , " No action / Icebox") , "No action / Icebox", IF( ISPICKVAL( Feature__r.Status__c , "Reviewing later") , "Reviewing later", IF( ISPICKVAL( Feature__r.Status__c , "On Roadmap") , "On Roadmap", IF( ISPICKVAL( Feature__r.Status__c , "Completed") , "Completed", " " )))))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Feature Status
